specific_question: How many years of data do we have on EV battery lifespan, including data on AI-enhanced battery management, as of Q3 2025?
answer: We have 5 years of data on EV battery lifespan, including data on AI-enhanced battery management, as of Q3 2025.
justification: This answer provides a quantitative understanding of the data available for analysis, helping to inform the potential impact of implementing AI-enhanced battery management on EV battery lifespan.
dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?
